original_text: The side rooms at each level were wider than the rooms on the level below them, because the temple's wall was less thick. There was a set of stairs that went from the lowest level to the middle level and up to the top level.
korean_text: 이 두루 있는 골방은 그 층이 높아질수록 넓으므로 성전에 둘린 이 골방이 높아질수록 성전에 가까워졌으나 성전의 넓이는 아래 위가 같으며 골방은 아래층에서 중층으로 위층에 올라가게 되었더라

sentences.original_text: The side rooms at each level
were wider than the rooms on the level below them
because the temple's wall was less thick
There was a set of stairs
that went from the lowest level
and up to the top level
